name: Subterraneum 2022
description:
In Subterraneum, you play as a young child trapped in an abandoned underground city, completely alone. Or at least, as far as you can tell... Your goal is to make it out of the town and escape to the surface. ━ Controls: Arrow keys/WASD/Joystick to move Up to climb Spacebar to jump
ESC to pause

━

Credits: Gabrielle W. - Producer and Game Designer/Programmer Oliver B. - Lead Programmer Elijah W. - Music and Sound Designer Isis S. - Lead Artist and Character Designer/Animator Moon D. - Character Animator and Tile/Prop Artist Stephen L. - Tile/Prop Artist Cooper N. - Tile/Prop Artist BBC Sound Effects & DigiPen Sound Library ━
(Special shoutout for Cooper and Stephen, thank you so much for your help!)
